column4: hello, virus issue on ubuntu 8.04 virus targeting machines on Samba
CERT advisory?
what's your proof that it's a virus?
all machines are automatically downlaoding porn and making icons like "freeporn.exe"
sounds more like a hoard of horny users :)
i dont want to talk on porn but the virus if it is ok
what machines? running ubuntu?
ubuntu 8.04
there's this thing called 'sarcasm', it tends to help break the ice of the situation a bit.. you should consider it now and then
so the links to freeporn.exe are showing up on ubuntu desktops, not wintendo machines?
yep on windows and ubuntu both however freeporn.exe dosent work on ubuntu but yes ubuntu systems are infected too so we shut down the server for now
so what's the problem?
why don't you run a virus scan on the systems and take the virus out?
doing that but the virus sits on samba so when it sees the machines shoop!!! it starts running and iam doing scans on ubuntu with calm av
sounds good - do you have virus scanners working on the wintendo-side of things?
yep and i found it
excellent.
badbuntu we had it earlier too!!
so what sort of virus is it showing up as?
1 badbuntu (/proc infector) 2 killer-av (samba share infector) both were brought by some person using a pen drive
